title: Stochastic proof of the sharp symmetrized Talagrand inequality
authors: Thomas A. Courtade, Max Fathi, Dan Mikulincer
abstract:
We give a new proof of the sharp symmetrized form of Talagrand's
transport-entropy inequality. Compared to stochastic proofs of other Gaussian
functional inequalities, the new idea here is a certain coupling induced by
time-reversed martingale representations.
